scripts.start:all: npx concurrently -k "npm run start:ngrx" "npm run start:ngss" "npm run start:elf" "npm run start:ngxs" "npm run start:akita" "npm run start:angular"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ngrx && npm run build:ngss && npm run build:elf && npm run build:ngxs && npm run build:akita && npm run build:angular
scripts.serve:all: npx concurrently -k "npm run serve:ngrx" "npm run serve:ngss" "npm run serve:elf" "npm run serve:ngxs" "npm run serve:akita" "npm run serve:angular"
scripts.wait-on: npx wait-on http://localhost:4200 http://localhost:4201 http://localhost:4202 http://localhost:4203 http://localhost:4204 http://localhost:4205
scripts.benchmark:dev: npx concurrently -k "npm run start:all" "npm run wait-on && npx cypress run"
scripts.benchmark:dev:open: npx concurrently -k "npm run start:all" "npm run wait-on && npx cypress open"
scripts.benchmark:prod: npm run build:all && npx concurrently -k "npm run serve:all" "npm run wait-on && npx cypress run"
scripts.benchmark:prod:open: npm run build:all && npx concurrently -k "npm run serve:all" "npm run wait-on && npx cypress open"
